#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<sstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
//#define inf 1000000007
#define mod 1000000007
const ll inf = 100000000000000007LL;
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define vi vector<int>
#define all(x) x.begin(),x.end()
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define x first
#define y second
#define N 100010
ll dp[51][51],d[51][51][51];int f[51][51];
ll solve(int n,int p,int k)
{
	ll &ret=d[n][p][k];
	if(ret+1)return ret;
	ret=0;
	if(n==1)
	{
		if(p==1)return ret=0;
		return ret=1;
	}
	int i=f[n][p];
	if(k<=i)ret=dp[n-i][p-1]+dp[i][p]+solve(i,p,k);
	else ret=solve(n-i,p-1,k-i)+dp[i][p];
	return ret;
}
int main()
{
	int T,i,j,k,t,ca=0,n,m;
	dp[1][1]=0;
    for(i=2;i<=50;i++)dp[1][i]=1,dp[i][2]=inf;
	memset(d,-1,sizeof(d));
	for(i=2;i<=50;i++)
	for(j=3;j<=50;j++)
	{
		ll x=inf;
		for(k=1;k<i;k++)
		{
			ll s=2*dp[k][j]+dp[i-k][j-1];
			if(x>s)
			{
				x=s;f[i][j]=k;
			}
		}
		dp[i][j]=x;
		for(k=1;k<=i;k++)
		solve(i,j,k);
	}
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
		printf("Case %d: ",++ca);
		scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&m,&k);
		cout<<solve(n,m,k)<<endl;
	}
}
